subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 38 points, 8 rebounds and 7 assists Saturday as Cleveland opened its first-round series against the Detroit Pistons with a 102-84 victory.
snippet: LeBron James had 38 points, 8 rebounds and 7 assists Saturday as Cleveland opened its first-round series against the Detroit Pistons with a 102-84 victory.
